import "./Navbar.scss" import { useState } from "react"; import React from 'react' import { ArrowDropDown, Notifications, Search } from "@material-ui/icons" import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { logout } from "../../authContext/AuthActions"; const Navbar = () => { const [isScrolled, setisScrolled] = useState(false); const context = useContext(contextValue) window.onscroll = () => { setisScrolled(window.pageYOffset === 0 ? false : true); return () => {window.onscroll = null}; }; return (
Homepage Series Movies New and Popular My List
KID
Settings dispatch(logout)}>Logout
) } export default Navbar
